title: Dark Fire (2U54)
text:
Set:	Mines of Moria
Kind:	Shadow
Culture:	Moria
Twilight:	1
Card Type:	Condition
Strength:	-2
Game Text:	To play, spot The Balrog. Plays on Gandalf. Each time the fellowship moves, Gandalf must exert.
Lore:	”…he seemed small, and altogether alone: grey and bent, like a wizened tree before the onset of a storm.”
Rarity:	U
